Quote.Author: Naomi Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: A dead end street is a good place to turn around

Quote.Author: Naomi Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: We're spirited and spiritual... and fun follows us around

Quote.Author: Naomi Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Change is the one thing we can be sure of

Quote.Author: Naomi Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: You shouldn't be ashamed of your pain. You have the right to have your pain treated

Quote.Author: Naomi Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a communicator

Quote.Author: Naomi Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a family of secrets; there was a lot of pathology in the family

Quote.Author: Naomi Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a darned good listener

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain is such an important thing in life. I think that as an artist you have to experience suffering

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: I always love being in the company of women. It's all about good conversation and great wine

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: When I had dark hair I definitely felt that I was more anonymous

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to make peace with yourself. The key is to find the harmony in what you have

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I'd started having kids sooner so I could have had a few more

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe in the workplace I have more courage than other areas in my life

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, I'm definitely a wild child

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: I know it's silly, but I still think I'm 28

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: As much as my kids keep me young, they also have the reverse effect when I don't have the energy

Quote.Author: Naomi Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: Some movies are the kind you take home with you at the end of the day, and some, you can let go

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need to follow trends to be stylish

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I have many different sides; I can be the life and soul of the party - or a wallflower

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: As a society we should be encouraging people out of the debt-culture mindset, not promoting it

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I was brought up in Britain, and I'm very proud of my Britishness and my culture

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids should be naughty and go through that rebellious phase I didn't have

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the greatest driver. I don't know if I'll ever master the art

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Your boss is only human and just wants the best from you

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: My mum believes in me almost more than I believe in myself

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I was too much of an innocent when I went to university

Quote.Author: Naomie Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's nothing more amazing than helping people every day

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't carry the burden of the past or the madness of the future. I live in the present

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: People's blessings give you the power to work tirelessly. The only thing required is commitment

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: I found that the corridors of power in Delhi were littered with lobbies of various kinds

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always believed in evolving a consensus before taking any major decision

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: I can say that out of 365 days, I manage to do yoga on at least 300 days

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: It is my absolute belief that Indians have unlimited talent. I have no doubt about our capabilities

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother is not educated but keeps in touch with world events through news on TV

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: We must ensure that technology is accessible, affordable, and adds value

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: I have worked hard since my childhood and worked as a labourer. I put my mind and heart into it

Quote.Author: Narendra Modi
Quote.QuoteValue: Before I became a chief minister, I never thought that one day I'd be the chief minister

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: I firmly believe that one of the best kept secrets to soft and glowing skin is moisturisation

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, fashion means dare. I don't mind wearing a bikini. I am okay with it

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: You should never go on diet and must follow a healthy lifestyle

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be known as an item dancer. I want to be known as an actress only

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: Stereotyping of any race or culture is narrow-minded, and I can't wait to help break the shackles

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: I crack jokes all the time. Even when I have a fight, I will make a joke, and people will laugh

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: Hard work and dedication is important to success, and I have those qualities

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't be surprised if you find me doing some charity work in another country

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to train your brain to be positive

Quote.Author: Nargis Fakhri
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anyone could play me. It would have to be me

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: The people I go after are the false experts, those who do not accept the limits of their knowledge

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never had personal debt and never will

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: Fragility is the quality of things that are vulnerable to volatility

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people are sceptical about the wrong things and gullible about the wrong things

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: The world we live in is vastly different from the world we think we live in

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: Poverty is clearly one source of emotional suffering, but there are others, like loneliness

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: The grandchildren should not bear the debts of the grandparents

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, children philosophize more than adults - and they are critical of adults

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: I hated school because I liked to daydream and the system tried to stop me from that

Quote.Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a private intellectual, not a public one

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't slip. Time catches up with them

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Critics don't buy records. They get 'em free

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Get me well so I can get on television and tell people to stop smoking

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an American citizen and feel I am entitled to the same rights as any other citizen

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: If I could read it, I could play it

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not the people in the South who create racial problems - it's the people who are governing

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Only time, education and plenty of good schooling will make anti-segregation work

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Primarily I'm a meat man, although once in a while I toy with a few vegetables

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: The people who know nothing about music are the ones always talking about it

Quote.Author: Nat King Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: There's just one thing I can't figure out. My income tax!

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: My idols are Janis Joplin and Annie Lennox, who are neither of them from the typical pop culture

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had my share of doing things that I really wish I hadn't done

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I know that God has had my back, even when I was screwing up

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Losing people is dark, but some things you just have to accept

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an ordinary person under extraordinary circumstances

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: When you reach 50, what you care about is being honest, being accurate, and being an example

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that I sound a lot better than Diana Ross

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been to hell and back. I have seen the edge. I have seen the dark side of life

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been on dialysis in Istanbul, Milan, Indonesia, Manila, London. It's - it's amazing

Quote.Author: Natalie Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is such a gift, I just say thank you all day

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: I did every job under the sun from bartending to ushering to temping

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: The Gili Islands gave me some of my best scuba diving experiences, including tons of turtles

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: It really bugs me the way people criticise how actors look. We're not models. Models exist

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to keep people guessing

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: You'd have to be an idiot to say no to 'Hunger Games.'

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes a woman's looks or sensuality are too readily wrapped up in their power

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: Long skirts are annoying; they get in the way

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's 'game' in the title, I'm there! Ready to play!

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: I love cycling

Quote.Author: Natalie Dormer
Quote.QuoteValue: I've taken my clothes off enough in my career

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm such a chameleon. I never get bored

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: I am such a bad liar. I would like to lie, though

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the idea of growing old gracefully and full of wrinkles... like Audrey Hepburn

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a nightclub person, but you need to have a social life sometimes

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: I seem to have very polite fans, not fanatical ones

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Enjoy every moment: you never know when things might change

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Isolation is a big part of songwriting

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm passionate about something, I just get excited

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Happy songs are very difficult to write. How many truly great upbeat songs are there?

Quote.Author: Natalie Imbruglia
Quote.QuoteValue: You're only as good as your last record and you could get dropped

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: When you love something, it doesn't feel like work

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe all positive things and negative things are valuable because they shape you

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an accidental entrepreneur

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: Work means independence. It allowed me to shape my life on so many levels

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: I attended private Catholic schools in Paris and Los Angeles through high school

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want success, be unique

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if I am predisposed to shop online, I see bricks and mortar as part of marketing

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: Britain has the most creative, dynamic and nimble fashion industry in the world

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: Bling is good

Quote.Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote.QuoteValue: My father always had people around the house who were famous psychics

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: Jasmine is just the most delicate and beautiful scent

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm pretty hard on myself in general

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're an actress or a musician, everyone thinks you're hot

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: Going to a party, for me, is as much a learning experience as, you know, sitting in a lecture

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not someone who sacrifice all for the cinema, my life will be always more important

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Gemini, so I change my mind every day

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone dreams of living in Paris

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: I speak fluent Hebrew and even dream in Hebrew when we visit there, once or twice a year

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved school so much that most of my classmates considered me a dork

Quote.Author: Natalie Portman
Quote.QuoteValue: Smart women love smart men more than smart men love smart women

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: The only time a woman really succeeds in changing a man is when he is a baby

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: Not even analysis, by itself, can transform you. You must still do the changing yourself

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: I was so overprotected, I used to think I was as delicate as people said I was

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: I never knew motherhood could be so truly gratifying until I had Natasha

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: I never saw film stars at home. We had no maid, no cook, no swimming pool

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't even go to the bathroom alone. My mother or a social worker always went with me

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: We were descended from royalty

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: We all wanted to copy Vivien Leigh

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: Warren and I are friends, but working with him had been difficult

Quote.Author: Natalie Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: There are certain stars who are not actors. I don't want to be that type

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a wild thing, that people have the ability to help each other by just relating to one another

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a theory that self-made, first-generation actresses don't feel entitled to success

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not someone who went to acting school - I was just out of the gate, doing it

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really feel like I need to be a teenager ever again

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty was never really my trip. Maybe those roles are attracted to me?

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: My hair is such a statement that it's like a neon sign asking for trouble

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to option 'Crying of Lot 49' and turn it into a movie

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: From the first instant I met her, I wanted to be Nora Ephron. I just really wanted to please her

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's face it. I'm an open book

Quote.Author: Natasha Lyonne
Quote.QuoteValue: I always see the absurdity in most situations. It's my experience of how life works

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate sets. I've always hated sets. I think that if you have a dining room set, break it up!

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: I love linen in soothing colors for any room in the house

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: Mixing in some rusty oranges is a warm way to update your place for fall

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: I live in a beautiful vintage building that was built in the heart of downtown Chicago

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: In a modern loft, you can't just fill a space with furniture. Each piece has to be perfect

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: In a minimal interior, what you don't do is as important as what you do

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: Layering in different patterns will keep things from appearing too studied

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: Books are the heart of any home, and I spend hours going through books for design inspiration

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I was the only kid on the block who knew about furniture scale by the time I was 8

Quote.Author: Nate Berkus
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I think I rearranged the rooms of almost every house on the block

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Me calling out Roy Jones is disrespectful

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never paid taxes in my life, so I'm probably going to jail

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't love to fight; I don't want to fight

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't come and fight for fun. I don't do that. I don't like to hurt people for fun

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I always took a fight; I always took everybody. I fought everybody

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: If anybody's getting a shot, somebody's getting a shot against me because I'm the guy to beat

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had been thinking business since I was 21, I'd be a rich man right now

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to fight the best guy. I always want to fight the best guy

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see a superstar out there. I don't see Georges St-Pierre coming back

Quote.Author: Nate Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I never did steroids in my life. I know all the fighters; they are all on steroids

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: We must become more comfortable with probability and uncertainty

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the same friends and the same bad habits

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: Distinguishing the signal from the noise requires both scientific knowledge and self-knowledge

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: If you aren't taking a representative sample, you won't get a representative snapshot

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: First of all, I think it's odd that people who cover politics wouldn't have any political views

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: Almost everyone's instinct is to be overconfident and read way too much into a hot or cold streak

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: I've just always been a bit of a dork

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: People gravitate toward information that implies a happier outlook for them

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: The public is even more pessimistic about the economy than even the most bearish economists are

Quote.Author: Nate Silver
Quote.QuoteValue: People still don't appreciate how ephemeral success is

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: No CEO ever says, 'Damnit, we need to increase research!' I want to encourage them to do that

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: We have the only cookbook in the world that has partial differential equations in it

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: Age can be wonderful for red wine, but not for spacecraft

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: Making money from enforcing patents is no more wrong than investing in preferred stock

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: The dilemma for early 21st century journalism is this: Who will pay for the news?

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: If I want popularity, I go to a chef's convention

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: If people don't find what you are doing threatening, then it is probably not very important

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: We should have more invention

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't let the secret recipe die with the inventor

Quote.Author: Nathan Myhrvold
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have a block of ballistics gelatin and a high-speed camera, pretty soon somebody gets a gun!

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Mountains are earth's undecaying monuments

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: We must not always talk in the market-place of what happens to us in the forest

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: You can get assent to almost any proposition so long as you are not going to do anything about it

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Accuracy is the twin brother of honesty; inaccuracy, of dishonesty

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is made up of marble and mud

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Religion and art spring from the same root and are close kin. Economics and art are strangers

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: A pure hand needs no glove to cover it

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Our most intimate friend is not he to whom we show the worst, but the best of our nature

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Selfishness is one of the qualities apt to inspire love

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Whaling was the oil business of its day

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, if you're at home with children, you lose twenty-five IQ points

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: To my mind, an adventure is something a person willingly undertakes

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Joseph Warren, like a lot of revolutionary leaders, was into Enlightenment literature

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: As an author of narrative history, I read a lot of history books

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot underestimate the influence of Shakespeare

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though I hadn't read a word of it, I grew up hating 'Moby-Dick.'

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, the hardest thing in the world is how to start a book

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll watch anything, from action to art films

Quote.Author: Nathaniel Philbrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading 'Moby-Dick' helps you discover how to live

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: Stay focused on the mission

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really easy to create a $1 billion company - you just have to solve a $10 billion problem

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: As fathers, we all have great lessons to teach our children

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's time we all agree that gender stereotypes are simply the confabulation of our own mind

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: Technology itself is neither good nor bad. People are good or bad

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: If you know you are giving your best effort, you'll never have any reason for regrets

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: As an entrepreneur, you only fail when you give up

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: Call it the Tiger Mom effect: In the business world today, failure is apparently not an option

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: Great entrepreneurs focus intensely on an opportunity where others see nothing

Quote.Author: Naveen Jain
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes a faint voice based on instinct resonates far more strongly than overpowering logic

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do not love yourself, well, you cannot do anything well, that's my philosophy

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, 'beauty' means to be natural, creative, honest - to say the truth

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: I am very much against makeup and high heels and all that we inherit as 'beauty.'

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: Unity is power; without unity women cannot fight for their rights anywhere

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: When we live in a world that is very unjust, you have to be a dissident

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: Plastic surgery is a postmodern veil

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: We here in Egypt are fed up with U.S. colonialism

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: In history, the millions win; that is democracy

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I look to myself mainly as a creative writer all my life and a medical doctor

Quote.Author: Nawal El Saadawi
Quote.QuoteValue: My three husbands were afraid of me. I am a very powerful woman

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: When someone is looking at me, I feel they are looking at someone standing behind me, not at me

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel happy that I am being honoured for doing films of my own liking

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: The village I come from is the most ruthless, lawless land one can encounter

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: In Mumbai, you have to act in real life, too

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very difficult switching over from one character to another

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: The easier it looks on screen, the more hard work goes into making it so

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: I am from a family of farmers from Budhana near Muzaffarnagar

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every easy role, there is a lot of hard work that goes in

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Freaky Ali' may look like an easy role to others, but it is not easy

Quote.Author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Quote.QuoteValue: I still can't believe it when people say I am a celebrity

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: The way we remember people, even their beauty is all so subjective and a matter of perspective

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel really connected to antiquity for some reason

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: In real life, too, women love to be that girl who tames the bad boy

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: It's bizarre to be given an award for being empathetic and kind, which is what we all should be

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: Frances Conroy - brilliant, brilliant actress

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: To have art suppressed is very dangerous to society

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: Medicine, anything academic, is a very Persian Iranian route to take in life, in one's career

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: As an Iranian woman and activist, Sotoudeh's plight resonated with me on a deeply personal level

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: In a lot of ways, I think television is better for women than film

Quote.Author: Nazanin Boniadi
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Homeland' is great at challenging our preconceived ideas

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: I think in metaphysical terms, I would call that increasing the speed of the vibration of life

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: It'll become obvious that we've really been working against ourselves

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: As we move into the 21st century, there's what the Bible calls a 'quickening of the spirit.'

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a divine purpose behind everything - and therefore a divine presence in everything

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: God is in the sadness and the laughter, in the bitter and the sweet

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: The Roman Catholics teach that unless you're a Roman Catholic you do not go to heaven

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that's a result of just a general increase in speed of the vibration of life itself

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: The new spirituality will step away from dogma, will step away from 'We're right and you're wrong.'

Quote.Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote.QuoteValue: Because our choices are largely based on survival. But if life is eternal, life is not a question

Quote.Author: Neil Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind

Quote.Author: Neil Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Research is creating new knowledge

Quote.Author: Neil Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand
